page.title: 10Dislikes and likes
page.content: The things about{Callington}we think we need, don't need, like and don't like. The{shopping area}is not very good, it is dear. At{Saltash and Plymouth it is cheaper because they are bigger places, and more popular. Three sweet shops in Callington are too many, two is ample. A{record and a computer shop}would be very popular. An{indoor swimming {pool}would be ideal for the holidays and also a roller skate rink, but I don't think there will be one. Summer sports is a event that takes place at the comprehensive in the summer holidays. It is good for there are many different sports. It would be nice to have a{clothes {shop}which sold all the fashions.
